value.title: Manage data source credentials in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage your data source credentials in Power BI. value.title: Enable QUERY FOLDING for native queries in Power Query / Power BI

Chris Webb Blog: https://blog.crossjoin.co.uk/2021/02/21/query-folding-on-sql-queries-in-power-query-using-value-nativequery-and-enablefoldingtrue/
